snippet: “BigMouth,” from the Belgian actor-writer-director Valentijn Dhaenens, jostles together the words of speechmakers throughout history.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews one-man show BigMouth, created and performed by Belgian actor Valentijn Dhaenens, at Public Theater as part of the Under the Radar Festival.
lead_paragraph: “BigMouth,” from the Belgian actor-writer-director Valentijn Dhaenens, jostles together the words of speechmakers throughout history.
